sentences.en: Both your pictures are of static subjects.
sentences.cn: 你的两张照片拍的都是静止物体。

sentences.en: Built-up static contributes to sick building syndrome.
sentences.cn: 高楼林立中的静电干扰是引发大楼病综合征的原因之一。

sentences.en: Don't take a static view of things.
sentences.cn: 不要用固定的眼光看问题.

sentences.en: Don't view things as static and isolated.
sentences.cn: 不要静止地孤立地看待事物.

sentences.en: Economists predict that house prices will remain static for a long period.
sentences.cn: 经济学家预测，房价将长期保持稳定。

sentences.en: For some months the share price remained fairly static.
sentences.cn: 有那么几个月，股票价格一直非常地稳定。

sentences.en: Large static charges may build up in the bed causing spark discharges.
sentences.cn: 大量静电荷可能在床内积聚而引起火花放电.

sentences.en: Static and dynamic displacement is another method of categorizing this parameter.
sentences.cn: 静态和动态位移是这个参数的另一种分类方法.

sentences.en: The aeroelastic phenomena may be subdivided under the heading static and dynamic.
sentences.cn: 气动弹性现象可以再分为静态和动态两个专题.

sentences.en: The condition that one must avoid is too large a static margin.
sentences.cn: 条件是我们必须避免过大的静稳定度.

sentences.en: The number of prosecutions has stayed static and the rate of convictions has fallen.
sentences.cn: 提起诉讼的数量持平，有罪判决率下降。

sentences.en: The number of young people obtaining qualifications has remained static or decreased.
sentences.cn: 获得各种资格证书的年轻人的数量一直保持不变或者已经减少。

sentences.en: The past is gone and static , nothing we can do will change it.
sentences.cn: 过去已经过去，是静态的，无论我们做什么都不会改变。

sentences.en: The static, aesthetic searchings of the Cubists were quite alien to them.
sentences.cn: 立体派的静止的 、 美学的探求是同他们格格不入的.

sentences.en: The water that fills the pores below thewater table is not static.
sentences.cn: 充填在潜水面以下孔隙中的水不是静止的.

sentences.en: There was too much static to hear their message clearly.
sentences.cn: 天电干扰太大,听不清他们的电讯.

sentences.en: They were made to listen to white noise, such as static of the sort you might pick up between radio stations.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫听白噪音，类似于你在调电台时听到的那种静电噪音。

sentences.en: When the weather turns cold and dry, my clothes develop a static problem.
sentences.cn: 天气变冷变干时，我的衣服就会产生静电问题。

phrases.tran_cn: 静态控制；静电控制；静态控件
静摩擦；干摩擦；库仑摩擦
静载荷试验；静负荷强度试验；静荷载试验
静强度；静力强度；静态性力量；静止强度

trans.tran_cn: 静止的，不变的，静电的，[物]静力的
静电，[物]静电（干扰），静力学，争吵
trans.tran_en: noise caused by electricity in the air that blocks or spoils the sound from radio or TV
